sum_bart: Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. received a letter dated April 17, 2025 enclosing an order dated April 11, 2025, passed by the Adjudication Committee of Executive Directors of the Reserve Bank of India (“RBI”), imposing a monetary penalty of Rs. 61.40 lakh.
sum_peg: We wish to inform you that the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has imposed a monetary penalty on Kotak Mahindra Bank for non-compliance with the directions issued by the RBI on Bank Finance Companies (NSBFC).
sum_t5: Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.’s compliance with the directions issued by the Reserve Bank of India under the provisions of Section 47A(1)(c) of the Banking Regulation Act, 1949 and Section 46(4)(i) of the Banking Regulation Act, 1949, and to take corrective measures as necessary in accordance with the directions issued by the Reserve Bank of India.

sum_bart: The ESOP Allotment Committee of the Bank has, today, allotted 27,240 equity s hares of Rs. 5/ - each.
sum_peg: Dear Sirs, we wish to inform you that the Allotment Committee of the Bank has, today, allotted 27,240 Equity Shares upon exercise of Employees Stock Options under the Kotak Mahindra Equity Option Scheme 2015.
sum_t5: Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. (Kotak Mahindra) has been allotted 27,240 equity shares of Rs. 5/ - each, upon exercise of Employees Stock Options under the Kotak Mahindra Equity Option Scheme 2015.

sum_bart: Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. is a bank based in Mumbai, India. The bank is a member of the National Stock Exchange of India (NSE)
sum_peg: Dear Sirs, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited will be held on Saturday, May 3, 2025 to, inter alia, approve the and Consolidated Audited Financial Results of the Bank for the quarter / financial year ended March 31, 202 5.
sum_t5: Pursuant to Regulation 29(1) and Regulation 50(1) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited (“Bank”) will be held on Saturday, May 3 , 2025 to, inter alia: (a) decide and approve the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results of the Bank for the quarter / financial year ended March 31, 2025; and (b) recommend dividend, if any, on equity
